info.name: Pixelated Portal
info.description: A fork of my old portal shader and a potential portal vfx direction for a game I am working on

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define S0(U) texture(iChannel0, (U)/R)
#define S1(U) texture(iChannel1, (U)/R)
#define S2(U) texture(iChannel2, (U)/R)
#define V(U) S0(mod(U,R))

#define decay .99

//wrap the space (useful when sampling)
#define A(U) T0(mod(U,R))
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer B
Buffer C
Buffer D
